alert.note: Alert for Chesterfield (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 10:20PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Chesterfield County through 1100 PM EDT... At 1020 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cheraw Municipal Airport, or 7 miles west of Cheraw, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cheraw, Pageland, Chesterfield, Cheraw State Park, Northeastern Technical College, Cheraw Municipal Airport, Ruby, Mount Croghan, McFarlan, Chesterfield Ruby Middle School, Cheraw Fish Hatchery, Bay Springs Fire Station, and Chesterfield Detention Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
